text: [Music]
you know I've often been asked about uh
why I went to Assyria and I really went
to ass Syria uh to Syria for two reasons
first I have a neighbor who's Syrian my
nextd door neighbor and he said I'd like
you to come to Syria and meet my family
and there are over 6,000 biblical sites
in Syria so I thought this would be
great I'd love to go see Syria the
second thing is I went there uh to see
if I could work with the churches there
to do what's called the peace plan which
is our Global uh peace plan Pac CE we
never go into detail on this it's uh
plant I mean uh promote reconciliation e
is equip leaders a is assist the poor C
is care for the sick and E is educate
the Next
Generation and uh we've been been uh
testing the Prototype of this peace plan
for four years promoting reconciliation
equipping leaders assisting the poor
caring for the sick educating Next
Generation in the last four years I've
sent out over 7,500 of my members on
their own it's like the peace peace core
in many ways only the it's church-based
going out to 68 countries these people
spend their own money and time to do
this so when I went to Syria I went to
um get information on uh could we do it
with churches there when I was there a
couple things
happened uh the president of the country
heard I was in the country he said oh
Rick Warren's in the country I'd like to
meet him so he invited me what am I
supposed to do say no I didn't go to see
him I certainly wasn't a political trip
I certainly wasn't a diplomat or
delegate I'm a pastor and I just
happened to be in the country and got a
request from The Office of the President
would you come meet me so I went and met
him went to uh his uh the whatever their
their office is and um uh you know we
talked and basically talked about
education talked about the peace plan
talked about student exchange um you
certainly don't have to agree with
everybody to um you know to talk and
that's that whole thing of treating with
Civility and uh so then what happened is
it got
controversial because the Syrian
government put out a statement that
basically said Rick Warren backs the
government blah blah blah well I didn't
say that at all and the first guy who
reported it said oh now you said all
this stuff and I wrote him an email and
said no I didn't say that he said well
I'm I'll look forward to seeing the
videotape of uh of that thing in other
words he didn't believe me I'm going to
check the videotape and see what you
said I said there is no videotape the
next thing he does is he goes on YouTube
and finds a tape of me walking around
being taped by a whole movie camera
uh in a market by a home movie guy who'
put a movie Up on YouTube he goes oh see
you did have a tape and he's called me a
liar I wasn't lying the fact is it
wasn't taped a a a video camera of me
walking around with a bunch of Pastors
in a market is not the same thing as a
videotape of a camera of a service of a
meeting with the president what they did
is at the meeting of the president at
the end they do and you do this with
every president I've ever met with you
have a photo op and they bring the press
in and they take a picture and he saw
that picture of me standing there and he
thought oh you must have a a video so
you lied about no I didn't lie about it
you didn't do your due
diligence
